docs.title: Welcome to hv.io.vn
docs.text: A test domain for projects in Hưng Vượng 1 in Thành Phố Hồ Chí Minh. There are a few servers running in our lab. They provide the services listedbelow:

docs.title: Triple-GPU server.home
docs.text:
This one is only available internally. With 3 GPUs and a combined VRAM of 22 GB it is good for :

  • 19 GB glm-4.7-flash with MoE and reasoning, 23 token/s on Open WebUI.
  • 17 GB translategemma:27b for 55 languages, maybe for the timeline project?
  • 20 GB qwen3-vl:30b vision-language model in the Qwen family, for texts in images on WebUI?

docs.title: Subdomains:
docs.text:
• llm.server.home The Open WebUI interface for the LLMs hosted on the server.
  • grafana.server.home Visualize the utilization of the server. I would like a combination of btop and nvtop.
  • wp.server.home A small test installation of wordpress to test features.

I would like an output like this:

docs.title: Raspberry Pi4 at pi4.hv.io.vn
docs.text: Apart from the main domain pi4.hv.io.vn it also has some services at a subdomain

docs.title: Tiny Chat interface
docs.text: Under llm.pi4.hv.io.vn I installed OpenWebUI to access a local ollama installation.

docs.title: Grafana
docs.text: This is just to visualize how much this 4GB tiny server is utilized.

docs.title: Wordpress
docs.text: Even a little wordpress installation is possible and can be accessed on wp.pi4.hv.io.vn. Being local it is actually really fast, compared to servers in a datacenter in Germany. Like for saiht.de/blog.

docs.title: Pihole network filter pi4.hv.io.vn/admin
docs.text:
I didn't know how much a browser connects to ad servers until I installed this one. The first days some 25% of all DNS traffic is related to ads and has to be blocked! What a blessing. Configuration and statistics at pi4.hv.io.vn/admin. Please don't ask me about this configuration - it took 12 hours with AI coding assistant to get this working!

A side effect is that it is also a DNS server. So I can use it for different services inside the network to be mapped to easy-to-remember domain names. Like llm.server.home without having to change the hosts table on each client computer in my network. Very handy!

docs.title: About
docs.text:
Just a small project site for some internet, docker, services, automation and network related ideas.

It handles a lot of io, and is located in Vietnam. That's where the io.vn domain name makes sense. And all the servers are in Hựng Vương 1 in TP HCM, which is the last part of this domain.
